tool_description: Calculates comprehensive session-level analytics including duration, frequency, depth metrics, and session quality scores from raw player activity data.

session_timeout.description: Minutes of inactivity before considering a new session

quality_metrics.description: Metrics to calculate for session quality

error_messages: Empty player data: At least one player data record must be provided.
Invalid session timeout: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 1440 minutes.
Invalid quality metrics: Must contain only supported metric names [duration, actions, progression, engagement, retention_indicators].
Malformed player data: Player data records must be in valid format.
usage: Provide player_data array from Player Data Extractor. Optionally set session_timeout and quality_metrics array. Returns detailed session analytics for all players.

sessions_per_player.description: Average number of sessions per player

detailed_metrics.description: Detailed session metrics for each player
